attributes.action: Stop the proposed plans to delay/cancel local elections next year
attributes.additional_details: It’s a threat to democracy, and it’s not in the interest of the people of the UK
attributes.background: We want the government to seriously backtrack on their plans to interfere with local elections next year. It is a threat to our democracy, and it’s not in the interest of the people of this country.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not postpone the local elections
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710155
